title: Together in the middle of nowhere
creator_credit: Tony Krawitz, Rachel Clements and AFTRS
brief_description: Vince embarks on an odyssey through the city streets while his girlfriend Jacqui works in a stripclub until dawn. Over one night they journey into the darkness of their own hearts to find out what really matters. Cast includes Mark Priestley as Vince and Hayley McElhinney as Jacqui
